thread.title: MCA to hand over Rs 1 crore to Maharashtra Government for drought
thread.title_full: MCA to hand over Rs 1 crore to Maharashtra Government for drought - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: MCA to hand over Rs 1 crore to Maharashtra Government for drought
text:
The Maharashtra Cricket Association today decided to hand over Rs one crore to the state government to tackle the drought situation in the region.*The 5th and final ODI between India and South Africa will be played at Mumbai's Wankhede Stadium. File pic*
"India-South Africa match is there on October 25 at Wankhede Stadium and ... Â»
